headline: How Secure Cloud Adoption Shapes Tyler Technologies Prospects Amid a 12% Slide in 2025
summary: If you’re wrestling with the question of whether to hang onto your Tyler Technologies shares, buy more, or look for greener pastures, you’re definitely not alone. This stock has been something of a rollercoaster lately. A quick glance at recent price movements tells its own story. Over the past week, Tyler Technologies inched up 2.2%, but zoom out to the last month and you’ll see a 4.3% dip. Year-to-date, things have been rougher, with shares down 10.7%. That softness has been visible on the...
